metadata.dc:author: Gouzien, G
Moreno, J L
Perret, J L
Lunven, Y
metadata.dc:description: A rare case of mandibular, malar and vertebral tuberculosis is reported. Special diagnostic and therapeutic features are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Tuberculose mandibulaire et malaire. A propos d'un cas.
[Mandibular and malar tuberculosis. Apropos of a case].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revue de stomatologie et de chirurgie maxillo-faciale
